name: Peter's Logic Experiment
description:
Peter's Logic Game is a small circuit builder game, you can make almost anything using the many logic games added. Also I've worked on some other fun things such as wifi and timers. In the future I'd like to make a Save and Load method however im still working out how, and I'd love to make a Puzzle mode in which you have to solve puzzles using limited recources

UPDATE!

Added a TV component and a Not Gate, also fixed the bug where deleting won't happen some times. and some minor bug fixes, also working on the Component Maker.

Music By:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsLlqLIE-TqDq3lh5kU2PeA
